word:
Chap. 323 - Captive Maid Shows Concern for Naaman 

     The Syrians . . . had brought away captive out of the land of Israel a little maid; and she waited on Naaman's wife. And she said unto her mistress, Would God my lord were with the prophet that is in Samaria! for he would recover him of his leprosy. 2 Kings 5:2, 3.
